channel.title: Project Regrace [ In Search For Development Team)
channel.description:
Well Ive Decided to make a new project Called Regrace, This is server is going to be using rs2dv's Base As it is very stable and very clean, this project will be reconstructing " Rune scape " but changing it making it better In other words doing stuff that rune scape didn't making it look great feel great.
Project Managers:
~Poridge ~ (open you will be chosen on how much work you do)
Development Places:
Map Editors: ~ ~ ~
Client Makers ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
Source makers ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
What We Will add is your decision Because it's the publics vote, runescape never let you decide? we do
Features We Deffintly will add ~ New Gameframe ~ New Textures ~ Quests ~ Specials ~ Armor ~ Minigames Ect, My Proof To Open a Development team is Here: [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/dnn4ic.png[/img]
Application Required Sorry.
How Long you programmed? What Coding Languages You Like? Why you want to join? Are You Sure? What Roll do you want?
Rolls available are ~ Cm ~ Sm ~ Me
[font=Verdana]Cm = Client Making Sm = Source Making Me = Map editing[/font]
[size=18pt]This Project Will Be Insane But I wish to do what no moparscapian has ever done ![/size] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/16hnvbd.jpg[/img] ^ | | How client might Look
Wcing Skill 80% Thieving 60% Quest's 3% (10 Quests added) Not Short!!!!

item.title: Project Regrace [ In Search For Development Team)
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:8, topic:282176"][quote author=CAPT_AMERIKA link=topic=372845.msg2814004#msg2814004 date=1244164566]
good luck making the client connect correctly to the server and syncing all movement between clients. that is going to be a bitch unless your not rewriting everything lol…
[/quote]

Why would these be in any way difficult?[/quote]

well unless you have a good understanding on how the server loads things and has things loading, it will be difficult. I personally have very low understanding on how the clients work so I would be no help. These guys are probably pretty good so they will have no problems

Read full topic

Nice work, woot first post.
[/quote]Thank you Sir, Would you like to join my development Team :D.[/quote]Sorry, im on already on a team, with the best coders on MPSC forum. By the way, thanks for the invite.

item.title: Project Regrace [ In Search For Development Team)
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

Well, for one I like the idea of adding New Textures sounds pretty ‘Beast’ if i do say so my self; Also Quest are always a good idea for a server, unless it’s like a talk ‘NPC’ 1, talk to ‘NPC’ 2 Kill ‘NPC’ 3 Quest complete. It should be more challenging, like for example try and make a Recipe for Disaster Quest that would be really good; Also if you did make a ‘RFD’ quest you could try and make the Rewards the same.

Read full topic
